attributes.action: Have a Christmas Bank Holiday on 25th June 2021 for a Post Covid Christmas
attributes.additional_details: I propose a bank holiday to lift the spirits of the nation and give us all something to look forward to.
attributes.background: Due to Christmas being so terrible for everyone this year I propose a second Christmas Day on 25th June 2021. This would be a Bank Holiday (Friday) once the pandemic is over. The date is exactly 6 months from Christmas Day.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554630
